headline: Coinbase Extends Losses After Huge Gains, Breaks Key Level – Is Coinbase Stock A Sell Now?
summary: Coinbase shares extended losses on Tuesday after a six-day losing streak and ahead of the company's quarterly earnings report due this week.  Shares rallied to their all-time high of 444.65 after the House passed the Genius Act and President Donald Trump signed it into law on July 18.  The law establishes a regulatory framework for digital coins pegged to the U.S. dollar.

The law establishes a regulatory framework for digital coins pegged to the U.S. dollar.

headline: PNC Seeking Client Access To Crypto Trading
summary: PNC Financial Services Group Inc. formed a partnership with crypto exchange Coinbase Global Inc. to offer its banking customers access to digital-currency services. PNC Bank Head of Treasury Management Emma Loftus joins Katie Greifeld and Tim Stenovec on "Bloomberg Crypto," to discuss.

headline: Is Stripe the Most Anticipated IPO Since Coinbase? Here's What to Know.
summary: With a recent valuation of $91 billion, Stripe could potentially be one of the largest IPOs ever.  The IPO market is experiencing a significant rebound this year, with a 45% increase in deals priced from last year.  This backdrop could be favorable for a listing, but Stripe management hasn't provided a timeline for going public.
